content:
Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 64, "index": 15}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 18, "index": 18}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 36, "index": 22}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}]
thought: To craft stripped_spruce_wood, I need to place 4 stripped_spruce_log in a 2x2 square in the crafting grid. I will start by moving one stripped_spruce_log from slot 29 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 64, "index": 15}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 18, "index": 18}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 36, "index": 22}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}]
thought: I now need to place another stripped_spruce_log next to the one in slot 1, so I will move the second stripped_spruce_log from slot 29 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 64, "index": 15}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 18, "index": 18}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 36, "index": 22}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 29}]
thought: I now need to place another stripped_spruce_log below the ones in slots 1 and 2, so I will move the third stripped_spruce_log from slot 29 to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 4 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 64, "index": 15}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 18, "index": 18}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 36, "index": 22}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 23}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}]
thought: I now need to place another stripped_spruce_log to the right of the ones in slots 4 and 5, so I will move the fourth stripped_spruce_log from slot 29 to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 5 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "experience_bottle", "quantity": 64, "index": 15}, {"type": "enchanted_golden_apple", "quantity": 18, "index": 18}, {"type": "zombified_piglin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 36, "index": 22}, {"type": "cyan_stained_glass", "quantity": 41, "index": 23}]
thought: I have now crafted the stripped_spruce_wood, so I will move it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
